amendment.description: Amendment makes several technical changes including limiting the principal amount of loans that may be made to any single borrower to a maximum of $30 million; prohibits the payment for any loss arising out of fraud or misrepresentation for which the party seeking payment is responsible; and makes available up to $5 million for functions including subsidy cost and other expenses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make technical changes, establish default and procurement procedures, and allow up to $5 million to be made available for specified subsidy costs and other expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
